query.statement:
SELECT '0' AS CHECK ,A.POSID AS PSPID ,A.ZSITE_NM ,INTEGER(A.ZQNTY) AS ZQNTY ,B.POSID_1 AS POSID ,B.ZZSHIP1 ,B.POSID_OLD ,RTRIM(B.POSID_DONG) AS POSID_DONG ,(CASE WHEN C.U_PDF = 'TRUE' OR C.U_PDF = 'true' THEN 'O' ELSE '' END) AS U_PDF , CASE WHEN B.ZZGUBUN = '10' THEN 'µ¿' ELSE '' END as DFCHAR , C.UFDATE , D.UKEY , '' AS TEMP , '' AS TEMP_POSID , '' AS SEQ , '' AS FLG FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.POSID = B.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTPDF AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.POSID = C.PSPID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTDONG AS D ON B.MANDT = D.MANDT AND B.POSID = D.PSPID AND B.POSID_1 = D.POSID WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PRART IN ('01', '11') AND A.ZQNTY >= 3 --AND B.POSID_DONG = '' AND B.ZZGUBUN IN ('10','11') AND B.TXT04 <> 'C' AND (C.CATE IN ('', 'L') OR C.CATE IS NULL)
AND A.POSID = #PSPID#
--AND B.ZZSHIP1 BETWEEN #FROM_DT# AND #TO_DT# AND C.UFDATE BETWEEN #UF_FROM_DT# AND #UF_TO_DT#
order by A.POSID, B.POSID_1
WITH UR
